LanguageData.DMS_CivilianChild01.description: Since [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a gravity-free environment, [PAWN_pronoun] childhood was spent on countless rehabilitation training and treatments. Although these treatments have allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to move freely in a normal gravity environment, [PAWN_pronoun] physical condition is still far inferior compared to other children of the same age.
LanguageData.DMS_CivilianChild01.title: Low G Adjuster
LanguageData.DMS_MilitaryChild01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born out of wedlock in the colonial fleet stationed on the planet's surface, and his biological father remained unknown. Fortunately, the soldiers stationed in the camp treated [PAWN_pronoun] as one of their children, allowing [PAWN_pronoun] to have a relatively complete childhood.
LanguageData.DMS_MilitaryChild01.title: Garrison child
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild01.description: Due to his outstanding performance in the colonial military academy [PAWN_nameDef] was trained as a reserve officer during his childhood, and achieved the rank of Warrant Officer upon reaching adulthood.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild01.title: Reserve Officer
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild02.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a colonial planet full of turmoil, and used [PAWN_pronoun] flexible skills to become a messenger and shuttle through the battlefield front lines full of electromagnetic interference and hostile fire. After the war, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to return to school for education.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild02.title: Child Orderly
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild03.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents disappeared in the line of duty while he could still remember it. Due to the military martyrdom clause of the colonial fleet, he received a series of compensations in order to support the entire time in completing the officer academy course.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild03.title: Son of Martyrs
